snippet: “Downton Abbey,” a quintessentially British dramedy of manners, has become a hit in a dozens of locales worldwide where viewers wouldn’t know a dowager from a dogsbody.
abstract: Television series Downton Abbey, absorbing if somewhat formulaic costume drama set in early decades of 20th century Britain, has become a worldwide hit; producers say show resonates so deeply because of its universal themes, like tensions of social status and unabashed romance.
lead_paragraph: “Downton Abbey,” a quintessentially British dramedy of manners, has become a hit in a dozens of locales worldwide where viewers wouldn’t know a dowager from a dogsbody.

headline.main: A Bit of Britain Where the Sun Still Never Sets
headline.print_headline: A Bit of Britain Where the Sun Still Never Sets
